column1: Smoque BBQ////The food at Smoque is EXCELLENT.  I understand that the long lines
column3: and the potential for running out of key menu items have the potential to detract from the overall experience (these are the only reasons I'm rating less than 5 stars).  However
column5: it's easy to see that all of the negative/mediocre reviews have been written by folks who are either inexperienced in BBQ (particularly the smoked kind) or hold a grudge against the place because of its popularity in the media
column6: and were just looking for some aspect of the restaurant's service or aesthetics to rail against.
